remarks: Properties that determine a polarity.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Nov-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
lpolset.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lpolset.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lpolset.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lpolset.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` W ) $.
lpolset.h $e |- H = ( LSHyp ` W ) $.
lpolset.p $e |- P = ( LPol ` W ) $.
islpold.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. X ) $.
islpold.1 $e |- ( ph -> ._|_ : ~P V --> S ) $.
islpold.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( ._|_ ` V ) = { .0. } ) $.
islpold.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x C_ V /\ y C_ V /\ x C_ y ) ) -> ( ._|_ ` y ) C_ ( ._|_ ` x ) ) $.
islpold.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> ( ._|_ ` x ) e. H ) $.
islpold.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` x ) ) = x ) $.
islpoldN $p |- ( ph -> ._|_ e. P ) $.
$d ._|_ x y $.
$d A x $.
$d W x y $.
$d ph x y $.
